script_phases.name: Copy DataManagerSDK dSYM
script_phases.script:
if [ "$CONFIGURATION" == "Debug" ]; then
      echo "Debug 빌드: 시뮬레이터용 dSYM 복사"
      cp -R "${PODS_ROOT}/DataManagerSDK/DataManagerSDK.xcframework/dSYMs/iphonesimulator/DataManagerSDK.framework.dSYM" "${DWARF_DSYM_FOLDER_PATH}"
    elif [ "$CONFIGURATION" == "Release" ]; then
      echo "Release 빌드: 실제 디바이스용 dSYM 복사"
      cp -R "${PODS_ROOT}/DataManagerSDK/DataManagerSDK.xcframework/dSYMs/iphoneos/DataManagerSDK.framework.dSYM" "${DWARF_DSYM_FOLDER_PATH}"
    else
      echo "알 수 없는 빌드 설정: dSYM 복사 생략"
    fi
